articles.title: New Maruti Alto K10 Build Quality Test by Knocking & Banging - Car Blog India
articles.description: A YouTuber decided to 'test' the build quality of the new Maruti Alto K10 by knocking and banging the body parts.
articles.content: The build quality of the new Maruti Alto K10 has been checked in this video by a YouTuber. He uses the simple method of knocking and banging on various parts of the Alto. Maruti is still betting big … [+2791 chars]
